scripts.setup: npm --prefix frontend install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix backend/gatewayservice install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix backend/routeservice install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix backend/driverservice install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix backend/userservice install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix backend/maintenanceservice install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix backend/ticketservice install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix backend/scheduleservice install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix backend/busservice install --no-audit --no-fund && npm run migrate:all

scripts.dev:userservice: cross-env PORT=3002 npm --prefix backend/userservice run dev
scripts.dev:ticketservice: cross-env PORT=3004 npm --prefix backend/ticketservice run dev
scripts.dev:scheduleservice: cross-env PORT=3005 npm --prefix backend/scheduleservice run dev
scripts.dev:busservice: cross-env PORT=3006 npm --prefix backend/busservice run dev
